data.message:
Thank you very much for your songs. No one and never listen to what you're doing and principle. Your songs are elegant, gorgeous, Russian fans love you so love and respect, so please, come to Russia, in Moscow. I'm listening to you since childhood, you can say, I grew up on your songs. I know many of your songs by heart, not because of not knowing. PLEASE COME TO RUSSIA 
WHEN WILL YOU COME TO RUSSIA?!
